title: Rambergsvallen
text: Rambergsvallen was a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> on <a href="Hisingen">Hisingen</a> in <a href="Gothenburg">Gothenburg</a>, <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>. It was used mostly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> matches and served as the home ground of <a href="BK%20H%C3%A4cken">BK Häcken</a>. The stadium held 7,000 people and was opened August 18, 1935.
